fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Shoot (Night): Shoot a target at night. If a non-Unseen player visits your target, you'll shoot them. If multiple do, you'll shoot nobody. 2 uses.
-Rampage (Night): Shoot everyone that visits your target, and your target. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: If Shoot fails, you will not lose a shot.
